124 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
125 CBaseRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::CBaseRicciFlow( CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H> * pMesh ): m_pMesh( pMesh), m_boundary( pMesh )
126 {
127  int idx = 0;
128  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter ++ )
129  {
130  V * v = *viter;
131  v->u() = 0;
132  v->idx() = idx ++;
133  }
134 };

143 //Compute the edge length
144 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
145 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
146 void CBaseRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_calculate_edge_length( )
147 {
148 
149  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshEdgeIterator eiter(m_pMesh); !eiter.end(); eiter++ )
150  {
151  E * e = *eiter;
152 
153  V * v1 = m_pMesh->edgeVertex1( e );
154  V * v2 = m_pMesh->edgeVertex2( e );
155 
156  double u1 = v1->u();
157  double u2 = v2->u();
158 
159  _length( u1, u2, e );
160  }
161 
162 };
163 
164 
165 //Calculate corner angle
166 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
167 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
168 void CBaseRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_calculate_corner_angle( )
169 {
170  //CStructure<CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>, V,E,F,H> pS( m_pMesh );
171  //pS._metric_2_angle();
172 
173  for ( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshFaceIterator fiter( m_pMesh); ! fiter.end(); fiter ++ )
174  {
175  F * f = *fiter;
176 
177  H * he[3];
178 
179  he[0] = m_pMesh->faceMostCcwHalfEdge( f );
180 
181  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
182  {
183  he[(i+1)%3] = m_pMesh-> faceNextCcwHalfEdge(he[i]);
184  }
185 
186  double l[3];
187  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
188  {
189  E * e = m_pMesh->halfedgeEdge( he[i] );
190  l[i] = e->length();
191  }
192 
193  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
194  {
195  he[(i+1)%3]->angle() = _cosine_law( l[(i+1)%3] ,l[(i+2)%3] ,l[i] );
196  }
197  }
198 
199 };
200 
201 //Calculate vertex curvature
202 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
203 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
204 void CBaseRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_calculate_vertex_curvature()
205 {
206 
207  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter ++ )
208  {
209  V * v = *viter;
210  double k = (v->boundary() )? PI: PI * 2;
211  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::VertexInHalfedgeIterator vh( m_pMesh, v ); !vh.end(); ++vh )
212  {
213  H * he = *vh;
214  k -= he->angle();
215  }
216  v->k() = k;
217  }
218 
219 };
220 
221 
222 //compute curvature error
223 
224 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
225 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
226 double CBaseRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_calculate_curvature_error()
227 {
228  double max_error = -1;
229  V * vert = NULL;
230 
231  for(typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh); !viter.end() ; viter ++ )
232  {
233  V * v = *viter;
234  double k = v->target_k() - v->k();
235  k = fabs( k );
236  if( k > max_error )
237  {
238  max_error = k;
239  vert = v;
240  }
241  }
242  printf("Vertex id is %d\n", vert->id() );
243  return max_error;
244 };
245 
246 //compute metric
247 
248 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
249 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
250 void CBaseRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_calculate_metric()
251 {
252 
253  _set_target_curvature();
254  //double error = 1e-6;
255  double threshold = 5e-4;
256  double step_length = 1.0;
257  _Newton( threshold, step_length );
258 
259 };
260 
261 //gradient flow method
262 
263 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
264 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
265 bool CBaseRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_flow( double error_threshold )
266 {
267  int num = m_pMesh->numVertices();
268 
269  for( int k = 0; k < 64000; k ++ )
270  {
271  _calculate_edge_length();
272  _set_target_curvature();
273  _calculate_edge_weight();
274 
275  _calculate_corner_angle();
276  _calculate_vertex_curvature();
277 
278  double error = _calculate_curvature_error();
279  printf("Current error is %f\r\n", error );
280 
281  if( error < error_threshold) return true;
282 
283 
284  //set b
285  for(typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); ++ viter )
286  {
287  V * v = *viter;
288  double dif = v->target_k() - v->k();
289  v->u() += dif * 2e-2;
290  }
291  }
292  return false;
293 };
294 
295 //Newton's method for optimizing entropy energy
296 
297 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
298 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
299 void CBaseRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_Newton( double threshold, double step_length )
300 {
301  int num = m_pMesh->numVertices();
302 
303 
304  while( true )
305  {
306  //the order of the following functions really matters
307 
308  _calculate_edge_length();
309  _calculate_corner_angle();
310  _calculate_vertex_curvature();
311  _calculate_edge_weight();
312 
313  double error = _calculate_curvature_error();
314  printf("Newton's Method: Current error is %f\r\n", error );
315 
316  if( error < threshold) break;
317 
318 
319  Eigen::SparseMatrix<double> M( num, num );
320  M.setZero();
321  _calculate_Hessain( M );
322 
323  Eigen::VectorXd b(num);
324 
325  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter ++ )
326  {
327  V * v = *viter;
328  int idx = v->idx();
329  b(idx) = v->target_k() - v->k();
330  }
331 
332  //std::cout << M;
333  //Eigen::ConjugateGradient<Eigen::SparseMatrix<double>> solver;
334  Eigen::SimplicialLDLT<Eigen::SparseMatrix<double>> solver;
335  std::cerr << "Eigen Decomposition" << std::endl;
336  solver.compute(M);
337  std::cerr << "Eigen Decomposition Finished" << std::endl;
338 
339  if( solver.info() != Eigen::Success )
340  {
341  std::cerr << "Waring: Eigen decomposition failed" << std::endl;
342  }
343 
344  Eigen::VectorXd x = solver.solve(b);
345  if( solver.info() != Eigen::Success )
346  {
347  std::cerr << "Waring: Eigen decomposition failed" << std::endl;
348  }
349  //std::cout << x.transpose();
350 
351  _normalization( x, num );
352 
353  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter ++ )
354  {
355  V * v = *viter;
356  int idx = v->idx();
357  v->u() += x(idx) * step_length;
358  }
359 
360  }
361 
362 };
363 
364 
365 //Newton's method for optimizing entropy energy
366 
367 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
368 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
369 void CBaseRicciFlow<V,E,F,H>::_calculate_Hessain( Eigen::SparseMatrix<double> & M )
370 {
371  std::vector<Eigen::Triplet<double> > M_coefficients;
372 
373  //set A
374  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshEdgeIterator eiter( m_pMesh ); !eiter.end(); eiter ++ )
375  {
376  E * e = *eiter;
377  V * v1 = m_pMesh->edgeVertex1( e );
378  V * v2 = m_pMesh->edgeVertex2( e );
379 
380  M_coefficients.push_back( Eigen::Triplet<double>( v1->idx(), v2->idx(), -e->weight()) );
381  M_coefficients.push_back( Eigen::Triplet<double>( v2->idx(), v1->idx(), -e->weight()) );
382 
383  }
384 
385  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter ++ )
386  {
387  V * v = *viter;
388  int idx = v->idx();
389  double w = 0;
390  for( typename CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::VertexEdgeIterator veiter( v ); !veiter.end(); veiter ++ )
391  {
392  E * pE = *veiter;
393  w += pE->weight();
394  }
395  M_coefficients.push_back( Eigen::Triplet<double>( idx, idx, w ) );
396  }
397 
398  M.setFromTriplets(M_coefficients.begin(), M_coefficients.end());
399 }
400 
401 }
